title: Major League Cricket to clash with The Hundred
body:
NEWS IN BRIEF

THIS YEAR’S edition of Major League Cricket in the USA will run from July 5 to July 28, a day later than originally planned, which will see the tournament overlap with the 2024 Hundred by six days. As a result, there is the potential for as many as 12 of the contracted overseas players in this year’s Hundred to arrive late for their stints. Southern Brave men’s coach Stephen Fleming, also coach of Texas Super Kings, is expected to be present at his Hundred franchise from the start of the campaign. The start of the men’s Hundred will also ...
